notes.pre: This is the Appleseed history file. All development, fixes, releases and enhancments are shown here.

remarks.p:
This is version 1.0 of Appleseed on .net 2.0.
It is a fully .net 2.0 solution, with the ability to deploy any way you like, and use of several .net 2.0 features
such as localization, ability to precompile, enhancments to web.config and more

ol.li: Create a new IIS site or a virtual directory from a existing IIS site called Appleseed pointing to your Appleseed Installation
Create an empty database (name it for example Appleseed).
Update the database information in web.config file (ConnectionString value)
Browse to your web site, a page will prompt you for update

remarks.p: Report any problems to Appleseed Community
